name: Shuyan Zhou
content: Shuyan Zhou Shuyan Zhou Assistant Professor, Duke CS, DukeNLP Email: shuyan.zhou@duke.edu [Google Scholar] [Github] [Twitter] [LinkedIn] Hi! I am an Assistant Professor at Duke CS. Before Duke, I was a research lead at Meta (Llama ‚Üí MSL) on general purpose computer use agents. I obtained my PhD from CMU LTI where I worked with Graham Neubig. I run i2x lab ‚Ä† turning {i}ntelligence into {x} where x = human e{x}perience and digital agent e{x}ecution at the moment. where we explore AI agents, their environments, and their interactions with humans. üïπÔ∏è We are recruiting several PhD students in the upcoming cycle. Please apply to Duke CS if you are interested in working with us. News August 2025: I joined Duke CS as an Assistant Professor. Experience Assistant Professor, Duke CS 2025.08 - Present Research Scientist, Meta 2024.08 - 2025.08 Under Ruslan Salakhutdinov Master ‚Üí Ph.D. of Language Technologies, Carnegie Mellon University 2018.08 - 2024.07 Advisor: Graham Neubig Ph.D. Resident, X, the moonshot factory 2022.05 - 2022.08 Host: Alex Polozov Research Intern, Microsoft 2020.05 - 2020.08 Host: Kaushik Chakrabarti Research Intern, Microsoft Research Asia 2017.07 - 2018.06 Host: Chin-Yew Lin
